title: Software Engineer
description: Looking for a skilled full-stack developer with experience in React and Node.js.

title: Data Scientist
description: Expertise in Python, Machine Learning, and AI required. Experience with TensorFlow is a plus.

title: Digital Marketing Manager
description: Responsible for managing digital marketing campaigns, SEO, and social media strategy.

title: HR Executive
description: Looking for an HR executive with experience in recruitment, onboarding, and employee engagement.

title: Cyber Security Analyst
description: Expertise in ethical hacking, risk assessment, and network security required.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: Experience with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud required. Certifications preferred.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design engaging user interfaces and enhance user experience for mobile and web applications.

title: Product Manager
description: Responsible for managing the product lifecycle, coordinating with developers, and improving user experience.

title: Backend Developer
description: Strong knowledge of Node.js, MongoDB, and REST APIs required.

title: Financial Analyst
description: Looking for a financial analyst with experience in budgeting, forecasting, and financial modeling.
